Cheaters, Cheaters, Cheaters How Is this possible? (According to Google) "Valve has an estimated net worth of $12 billion and is still growing" Alone In 2021 They're So Rich They Lack The Common Courtesy To Develop An Anti-Cheat Worth Using/Funding. Brain Dead Apes Run These Corporations. Honestly A Sad Time In Gaming. All Good Games Are Neglected And Plagued With Nothing But Cheaters.

The BEST FPS Game In The World..

The CS:GO community is one of the most pathetic you'll come across hands down. "Adults" that have been playing Dust II map for 15+ years and are still at silver level end up kicking you half the time before the game is over if you're not playing well or just get butt hurt over nothing. The company behind the scummiest players ever to put their morbidly obese, living in their momma's basement til 40 years old) fingers on a keyboard are proud of what they've "built". F- customer support with blatant laziness and bare minimum supports these types of "players". Let's be honest, this gaming community should never be complimented with the word "player". Their 3rd step mom never made them play organized sports, therefore they have to resort to 10.000 hours on 1 single map. This game also incorporates the most noob gun ever created in an FPS - the AWP. 0 bullet drop and 0 bullet travel time make this gun an ultimate result for a snoozefest you wont wake up from. Meanwhile, the AK-47 can't shoot straight from 4 feet away if you aren't standing 100% still. Inconsistent bullet registry with a bunch of desperate assholes that have given up on real life ruining 25% of games makes this for a dumpster fire, certain to raise your BP in no time.
if you have good aim then u will be fine, but if ur a valorant player just go back to that.
